casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lee FARMER 8A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2019

Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, Attorney at Law, For Farmer, Jimmy Lee

Anna M. Szamosi, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of March 2019 by Defendant:

*581"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of March 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 15th day of March 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
